exm.mng: to be jealous of (sb's achievements etc), to be envious, envy
to be jealous, to envy, to hate
to be jealous of, to envy, jealousy, envy
to be jealous of (sb's achievements etc), to be envious, envy
heaven is jealous of heroic genius (idiom); the great have great hardship to contend with, those whom the Gods love die young
to envy the virtuous and talented (idiom)
jealous of the able, envious of the clever (idiom)
